testCase.name: AuthGuard should validate properly and return true given good input
AuthGuard should error given no auth header
AuthGuard should error given invalid bearer format
RolesGuard should execute without error and call the handlePathParamFunction when path param is present
RolesGuard should execute without error and call the handleBodyParamValidation when path param is present
RolesGuard execute the handlePathParamValidation with existing property
RolesGuard execute the handleBodyParamValidation with nested dto object
RolesGuard execute the handleBodyParamValidation with nested dto object and fail
